title: What song from a movie gets stuck in your head? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh my gosh… I get almost any song stuck in my head so easily, it seems… Most of the songs from the soundtrack of Rent. “Let It Go” from Frozen “9 to 5” from the movie by the same title Most of the songs from the soundtrack of “Moana” Most of “The Lion King” soundtrack And then a lot of songs from Broadway - here are some, just to name a few: “Defying Gravity” and “Popular” from Wicked “Alexander Hamilton” and “The Schuyler Sisters” from Hamilton “Blackout/Fireworks” from In The Heights

… have a couple in mind…. Waterworld… 'mariner' is teaching Enola how to swim…. ////// i like the music of Oceans 11. Tess walking down the stairs…also, the goofy tune playing when Rusty is telling the bartender, “ I'm running away with your wife”…///// ….the theme music to 'The Closer" , Kyra Sedgwick…///Terminator, Salvation..the scenes around 7/11 being found, and where the tow truck is on/off the bridge..not so much 'music', great sounds…Beginning music of ‘Jackal’, Willis, Portier, Gere…///. um….
